title: Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth       Our Junior Ranger Program Imagine the earth shaking beneath your feet while volcanic ash and hot cinders fall from the sky. What was that like for Native American people who lived here when Sunset Crater Volcano erupted? What are scientists doing today to study volcanoes and earthquakes? Maybe someday, we will be able to predict them. Become a Junior Ranger, and maybe one day you can help with the research! WebRangers Become a WebRanger. Now you can have fun and learn about national parks even if you are not able to visit a park right now.
